entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 06:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
